Bueno, muy bueno... Puzzles no tan dificiles pero meh, yo había venido por continuar la historia de Chell y GlaDos y no me decepcione. Lo único que me llamó la atención fue su corta duración, pero pague $22 ARS por el juego asi que... meh.

One of the best gaming experiences I know I will ever have, period. Such a wonderful game play/storytelling experience. If you're on the edge, buy it now. If you are reading this and think for some reason you don't want to play this beautiful game, buy it now. You'll find something to enjoy. Not a big financial commitment either... Just BUY IT

What can I say about Portal 2? Even after all these years this is just a masterpiece game. It's immersive, fun, has infinite replayability & is a game you can tell the devs put alot of heart and soul into this game. You get the sense this game is full of passion. Its brilliant, funny and just an amazing game. A timeless classic.

YOU MUST BUY THIS GAME!
